summary: It is my ENB setting + FXAA. This setting game has an incredible contrast and depth of the game. What more to add ..... Please look at the screenshot :)
descriptionHtml: It is my ENB setting + FXAA. There is no loss in FPS. This setting game has an incredible contrast and depth of the game. What more to add ..... Please look at the screenshot :)                                        [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/8475/screenshot221280x720.jpg[/img]                           [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4372/screenshot241280x720uudx.jpg[/img]                   [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/1794/screenshot201280x720.jpg[/img]                          [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/3785/screenshot311280x720.jpg[/img]                           [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/2246/screenshot351280x720.jpg[/img]                              [img]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/3079/81757605.jpg[/img]                                                                                                                 Instalation:                                                                                                                                                           1. Paste the folder Vignette (with black bars) or from a folder NO Vignette (no black bars) all the files to a folder Skyrim (where tes.exe file)                                                                                                                                                                                                						2. First Install this file ENB Boris Vorontsova-v0.108 TrueHDR (simplified version, but fast) only the file d3d9.dll	                                                                                                                                      3. Open documents / my games / Skyrim / SkyrimPrefs and change the bFloatPointRenderTarget = 1    4. In SkyrimLauncher select options FXAA                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         	5. Start the game and have fun :)                                                                                                           PS. Who wants to get a picture like on my screens, install IMAGINATOR on this page http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13049							              Start the game and set:											                                 1.Use contrastor functions                                                                                                                  a) contrast -40                                                                                                                                     b) brightnes +32                                                                                                                                 c) saturation -32                                                                                                                                  2.Use preset color schemes                                                                                                                 a) warm desaturation +1                                                                                                                     b) cool midnight +1                                                                                                                              3.Use tintor function                                                                                                                           a) add green +1                                                                                                                                   Credits:                                                                                                                                               Boris Vorontsov- ENBSeries                                                                                                                 MyGoodEye i Gopher- IMAGINATOR - Visual Device Control Skyrim 	                                                    donlucka-alias hashshashin- Super Realistic Cinema ENB
author: donlucka-alias hashshashin
